text: Gen Ueda (born 18 July 1949) is a Japanese equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Equestrians at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1982 Asian Games
title: Gen Ueda
